# Tab content



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Tab Content displays a set of Tab Panel elements.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                         | Type                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `value`  | `value`   | Defines the value of the component. | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                  |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------- |
|      | Passes the Tab Content to the Tab Container. |
